sentences.en: And the half dozen canoes beached like bright fish along the grassy shore of the lake.
sentences.cn: 还有五、六只独木舟停泊在碧绿的湖边,象一尾尾闪闪发光的鱼.

sentences.en: Dugout canoes are used to tra ort fresh goods to the market.
sentences.cn: 独木舟用于运输新鲜食物到市场上去.

sentences.en: Events are also held for one - man and two - man Canadian canoes.
sentences.cn: 也有单人、双人划艇项目.

sentences.en: His canoes are known for their style, fine detail and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟以其风格独特、注重细节和做工精细著称。

sentences.en: I could see long canoes cutting through the waves.
sentences.cn: 我看见长长的独木舟破浪而行。

sentences.en: Nearby were two canoes in which they had came to the island.
sentences.cn: 附近有两只他们来这个岛坐的独木船.

sentences.en: Nearby were two canoes in which they had cine to the island.
sentences.cn: 附近有二条独木舟,他们就是坐这个独木舟来的.

sentences.en: Nearby were two canoes in which they had come to the island.
sentences.cn: 附近有两只他们乘坐到这岛上来的独木舟.

sentences.en: One or two canoes with boys in them sped past on the current.
sentences.cn: 一两只载着孩子们的小游船在水面上掠过.

sentences.en: Paddles are used especially to propel canoes and kayaks.
sentences.cn: 短桨特别用于划独木舟和小艇.

sentences.en: The Indians peeled the bark from birch trees to make canoes.
sentences.cn: 印地安人从桦树剥下树皮做独木舟.

sentences.en: The Indians peeled the bark from trees to make canoes.
sentences.cn: 印第安人从树上剥下树皮做皮舟.

sentences.en: The rivers are our brothers; they quench our thirst. The rivers carry our canoes, and feed our children.
sentences.cn: 我们兄弟的河流解了我们的渴，河流载送我们的独木舟而且喂养了我们的孩子。

sentences.en: The uproar reached the ears of the men in the canoes.
sentences.cn: 喧嚣声传到了一条条独木舟上的男子们耳里.

sentences.en: This is the Rolls-Royce of canoes.
We watched a hundred canoes drift downstream into their villages.
sentences.cn: 我们看到100艘独木舟顺流漂到他们的村庄.

sentences.en: When we reached the downstream end of the island and were about to get back into our inflatable rafts Cho said, "Ed – look behind you". I turned and saw five canoes paddling up to us.
sentences.cn: 当我们走到小岛在下游处的顶端准备回到橡皮艇上时，裘对我说，“艾德，看后面，”我回过头来，看见有五条独木舟正向我们划来。

trans.tran_cn: 小而轻的舟，独木舟( canoe的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: A canoe is a small, narrow boat that you move through the water using a stick with a wide end called a paddle
